description:
The Kaientai fleet comes under attack from the Harusame division without any troops. Can Sakamoto, Mutsu, and Nobunobu get out of this alive?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arc de la bataille finale de Rakuyô 5 - Les deux idiots
Battle on Rakuyo Arc: Part 5 - The Two Fools
Rakuyou Kessen Hen Go: Utsukemono Futari
洛陽決戦篇五 うつけもの二人
